name: Rockheads Jorg
description: Jorg needs more gold to drink!

name: John The Wet
description: Our waters in the dungeon aren't polluted enough
action_b: Sell the oil you found in his swamp

name: Accidental sacrifice
description: An adventurer falls on a knife and sacrifices himself to you

name: Summer Fashion
description: A new grim reaper robe is out for only 99.99 gold

name: Mysterious Key
description: You find a key while walking in your dungeon
action_a: It's made of gold! Melt it

name: Boar Vessel
description: An interesting boar vessel appeared in the dungeon
